com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager.contents

Interface CellBuilder


  • public CellBuilder

    Something that can be built into a table cell, OR just something rendered within a box model (like HTML) where the table-free cell is the box.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CellBuilder add(LineWrappable rs)
      Adds the given interface LineWrappable content to this cell. To add multiple Renderables at once, use .addAll instead.
      CellBuilder add(TextStyle ts, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> ls)
      Adds a list of text with the given textStyle
      CellBuilder addAll(java.util.Collection<? extends com.planbase.pdf.layoutmanager.lineWrapping.LineWrappable> js)
      Adds the given list of interface LineWrappable content to this cell.
      CellBuilder align(Align a)
      Creates a new CellBuilder with the given alignment
      CellBuilder cellStyle(CellStyle cs)
      Creates a new CellBuilder with the given BoxStyle
      float getWidth() 
      CellBuilder textStyle(TextStyle x)
      Creates a new CellBuilder with the given TextStyle
